at_the_well.name: At the Village Well
at_the_well.short: A nice stroll in the village square
at_the_well.text: You are having a nice stroll near the center of the village. There stands a well. What would be going on there today?

options.name: Run into Trader John
options.short: He is taking a stroll, you could strike up a conversation
options.pass_long: You strike up a conversation and get gossip
options.fail_long: You try to strike up a conversation, but John is disinterested
options.pass_quality_change: $trader_john_affordance++, $gossip[source:was shared by John at the well] += 5

options.name: Have a fresh drink
options.short: Just a drink. Fresh water from the well
options.pass_long: You drink some of the fresh water. How wonderful!
